analyzed: nam mkha' med par gang gis shes pa na //

analyzed: grub pa chen po ye shes che // blang dor med pa'i sa chen po //
translated: The great accomplishment is great pristine consciousness.ğŸ”½The great stage without accepting and rejecting,

translated: the twenty-sixth chapter on the instructions of the great secret is

analyzed: tshad bzhis phab pa'i don yin te //

original: 'bru lngar bsdus pa thabs che te //
analyzed: 'bru lngar bsdus pa thabs che te //

analyzed: 'gro ba kun la rang rig gnas //

analyzed: bya ba med la byas pa med //

analyzed: bum pa bzang dang yid bzhin mdzod //

original: gsang ba'i snying po de kho na nyid nges pa las /

original: de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku gsung thugs rdo rje'i bdag po sangs rgyas thams cad kyi ngo bo nyid kyis khro bo'i dkyil 'khor du mngon par 'du mdzad de /

translated: Then, the lord of the vajra body, speech, and mind of all tathÄgatas, the embodiment of all buddhas, emanated the wrathful mandala.

original: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na /

original: bdag tu rmongs pa'i rtog pas brtags pa la mngon par zhen pa dang / yang dag pa'i lam dang bral ba dag gab pa'i gsang ba ma rtogs par sbas pa'i gsang ba la mngon par 'tshal nas rgyu dang 'bras bur rmongs pas /
analyzed: bdag tu rmongs pa'i rtog pas brtags pa la mngon par zhen pa dang / yang dag pa'i lam dang bral ba dag gab pa'i gsang ba ma rtogs par sbas pa'i gsang ba la mngon par 'tshal nas rgyu dang 'bras bur rmongs pas /
translated: Those who are attached to the conceptions imputed by the delusion of self and are devoid of the true path, not realizing the concealed secret, aspire to the hidden secret. Confused about cause and effect,

original: srid pa'i sa bon rtsub mos 'phangs nas mtshams med pa'i rab tu cha ba'i dmyal bar skyes so //
analyzed: srid pa'i sa bon rtsub mos 'phangs nas mtshams med pa'i rab tu cha ba'i dmyal bar skyes so //
translated: they are cast by the harsh seed of existence and are born in the extremely terrible hells of immediate retribution.

original: de rab tu tsha ba'i sdug bsngal drag pos gdungs pa dang / 'dod pas gdungs nas 'di bas shin tu grang mang ci ma rung snyam pa'i mod la rab tu sbrebs pa padma ltar gas pa'i sdug bsngal drag po dag gis rab tu nyen pa de lta bu'i sdug bsngal rab tu tsha ba la sogs pa brgyad dang /
analyzed: de rab tu tsha ba'i sdug bsngal drag pos gdungs pa dang / 'dod pas gdungs nas 'di bas shin tu grang mang ci ma rung snyam pa'i mod la rab tu sbrebs pa padma ltar gas pa'i sdug bsngal drag po dag gis rab tu nyen pa de lta bu'i sdug bsngal rab tu tsha ba la sogs pa brgyad dang /
translated: When they are tormented by the intense suffering of the extremely hot hell, and when they are tormented by desire and think, â€œHow nice it would be to be very cold,â€ they are immediately afflicted by the intense suffering of the splitting-like-a-lotus hell.

original: shin tu grang ba la sogs pa brgyad po dag tu 'jig @363b rten gyi khams brgyud cing bskal pa chen po stong phrag bcu gnyis su myong ngo //
analyzed: shin tu grang ba la sogs pa brgyad po dag tu 'jig @363b rten gyi khams brgyud cing bskal pa chen po stong phrag bcu gnyis su myong ngo //
translated: They experience these eight hot hells and eight cold hells in sequence, and they experience them for twelve thousand great eons.

original: de nas rnam par smin pa de zad pa dang yi dvags ltog pa dang skom pa'i sdug bsngal gyis nyen pa dang / 'dod pa'i dngos po rnams yid du mi 'ong ba dang / gdug cing rtsub pa'i dngos po sna tshogs su 'gyur pa dang /
analyzed: de nas rnam par smin pa de zad pa dang yi dvags ltog pa dang skom pa'i sdug bsngal gyis nyen pa dang / 'dod pa'i dngos po rnams yid du mi 'ong ba dang / gdug cing rtsub pa'i dngos po sna tshogs su 'gyur pa dang /
translated: Then, when the effects of those actions are exhausted, they become hungry ghosts tormented by the suffering of hunger and thirst, and they experience desirable things as being undesirable and as being various kinds of fierce and rough things.

original: yong med par yang 'gyur zhing shin tu rid cing bskams pa dang / lus dang yan lag dang dbang po mi 'tsham par gyur pa dang / bskal pa chen po drug tu skyes so //
analyzed: yong med par yang 'gyur zhing shin tu rid cing bskams pa dang / lus dang yan lag dang dbang po mi 'tsham par gyur pa dang / bskal pa chen po drug tu skyes so //
translated: He was born in the great hell of Ultimate Torment for six eons.

original: de nas las kyi sgrib pa rtsub mo'i rnam par smin pa de khad kyis bslabs pa dang sngon gyi srid pas mtshams sbyar nas yi dvags srin po chen po rab tu gdug pa gtum po lus gcig la mgo rgya ba dang / mgo sna tshogs pa dang /
analyzed: de nas las kyi sgrib pa rtsub mo'i rnam par smin pa de khad kyis bslabs pa dang sngon gyi srid pas mtshams sbyar nas yi dvags srin po chen po rab tu gdug pa gtum po lus gcig la mgo rgya ba dang / mgo sna tshogs pa dang /
translated: Then, after gradually exhausting the ripening of that very coarse karmic obscuration, he was reborn in the intermediate state as a very fierce and cruel rÄká¹£asa ghost. He had a single body with many heads,

original: lus brgya mgo gcig pa dang / lus sna tshogs pa dang / yan lag mang po dang / yan lag sna tshogs dang / gdug pa'i lag cha sna tshogs pa thogs pa 'khor rab tu mang po dang / 'jigs pa'i gzugs sna tshogs dang / 'jigs pa'i nga ro sna tshogs sgrog pa /

translated: many bodies with a single head, many bodies with many heads, many limbs, various limbs, and various terrifying weapons. He had a very large retinue of various terrifying forms and various terrifying voices.

original: gzugs dang / nga ro dang / dri dang; kha rlangs kyis thams cad skyi bung zhes byed pa /
analyzed: gzugs dang / nga ro dang / dri dang; kha rlangs kyis thams cad skyi bung zhes byed pa /

analyzed: rab tu 'jigs pa'i rlung grang ba dang tsha ba'i dbugs kyis phyogs kun tu khams 'khrug par byed pa /
translated: With the terrifying winds of his breath, cold and hot, he disturbs the elements in all directions.

original: nad bzhi rgya rtsa bzhis 'debs pa byed pa /ğŸ”½myos shing nyams par byed pa'i mthus klu'i ris dang / lha ma yin gyi ris dang / lha'i ris dang / tshangs pa'i ris dang / 'od gsal dang / dge rgyas dang / 'bras bu che ba man chad @364a *//
analyzed: nad bzhi rgya rtsa bzhis 'debs pa byed pa / myos shing nyams par byed pa'i mthus klu'i ris dang / lha ma yin gyi ris dang / lha'i ris dang / tshangs pa'i ris dang / 'od gsal dang / dge rgyas dang / 'bras bu che ba man chad @364a *//
translated: He causes the four hundred and four diseases to arise.

original: ae ma'o ya mtshan 'phrul chen gyi //

translated: Amazing! The great magical

analyzed: mched lcam khrag 'thung sran chen ri rab brtan //

analyzed: phrag dog che mchog phrag dog chen po'i sku //

analyzed: bud med kun bsdus dkyil 'khor dbus gnas shing //

analyzed: lam nor gdug par @402a *//

analyzed: bcas pa phat kyis gsod //

analyzed: zhing gi sham thabs gdug pa 'dul bar bsnams //

analyzed: zhabs dang phyag tu gyur pa bsam thag chad //

analyzed: zhabs g-yas thabs chen mang pos dbang sdud 'dor zhing bskum //

analyzed: rdo rje se gol 'phyar brdabs gnyis cher rab sel mdzad //
translated: Waving the vajra and snapping the fingers, the great one completely removes the two.

analyzed: 'od chen dbus nas glog chen rab 'gyur ba'i //
